data.text: “Wengena oseneno magi duto,
Gima ungʼeyo, an bende angʼeyo;
To Jehova Nyasaye Maratego ema daher mondo awuogo
Un to uumo adiera gi miriambo;
Kudwaro nyiso ni uriek
Koro winjuru ane gima awacho;
Ere gima omiyo uwuoyo marach kuom Nyasaye?
Bende Nyasaye nyalo yie kodu
Bende doyud adiera kuomu kononou?
Obiro kwerou ratiro
Donge tekone biro goyou gi kihondko?
Ngeche muthoro mangʼenygo onge tich mana ka buch kendo;
“Lingʼuru kendo weyauru awuo;
Angʼo madimi abed e chandruok,
Kata ka onega, to pod abiro keto genona kuome;
Chutho, mano ema biro kelona resruok
Chik iti mos mondo iwinj wechena;
Kaka koro aseikora dwoko wach makora,
Bende ngʼato kuomu nyalo donjona ni an jaketho?
“Yaye Nyasaye, yie itimna mana gik moko ariyogi
Gol lweti oko kuoma
Eka iluonga e nyimi kendo abiro dwoki,
Richo gi ketho adi ma asetimo?
Angʼo momiyo ipando wangʼi
It yien ayiena ma yamo teroni to isando nangʼo?
Idonjona gi weche malit,
Irido tiendena gi nyororo;
“Omiyo koro dhano rumo mos mos kaka gima otop,
